meanings.definition: A method of dyeing fabric by covering certain areas with wax before dyeing.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to create beautiful patterns on fabric using battik.
meanings.sent2: The battik technique involves wax-resist dyeing to achieve unique designs.
meanings.sent3: The art teacher accidentally spilled wax all over the classroom, turning it into a battik workshop.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a battik masterpiece, carefully preserving some parts while coloring others.
meanings.sent5: The intricate battik patterns seemed to dance on the cloth, telling stories of ancient traditions.

meanings.definition: A fabric that has been dyed using the batik method.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful battik dress to the cultural festival.
meanings.sent2: The battik fabric had vibrant colors and intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The battik scarf looked like a piece of art, not just a piece of clothing.
meanings.sent4: The battik tablecloth added a touch of elegance to the dining room.
meanings.sent5: The battik pillowcases brought a pop of color to the otherwise plain room.
